body_html:
Hmm I still think it would just be nicer to have one consistent API instead of a bunch of methods scattered over files. How about this: you can either use distributions.kl, or we add an option to lookup functions for types, and you can cache the function wherever you want. Something like:

kl_gamma_gamma = distributions.kl(Gamma, Gamma)
@register_kl(LogGamma, LogGamma)
def kl_loggamma_loggamma(p, q):
    return kl_gamma_gamma(p._gamma, q._gamma)
